item.title: 开战三年，美欧与俄罗斯保持数十亿美元的贸易往来
item.description: 在俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京发动全面入侵乌克兰三年之后，美国和欧盟仍在进口价值数十亿欧元的俄罗斯能源和商品，从液化天然气到浓缩铀，不一而足。【原文：Three years after Russian President Vladimir Putin launched his full-scale invasion of Ukraine, the United States and European Union still import billions of euros worth of Russian energy and commodities, ranging from liquefied natural gas to enriched uranium.】

item.title: 产量增加，Suncor Energy 第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: 周二，加拿大石油生产商尚科能源公司（Suncor Energy）第二季度利润超出分析师预期，因为产量增加有助于抵消商品价格疲软的影响。【原文：Canadian oil producer Suncor Energy exceeded analysts' second-quarter profit expectations on Tuesday, as higher output helped offset the impact of weak commodity prices.】

item.title: 芯片需求强劲，苹果供应商 Skyworks 预计季度业绩乐观
item.description: 苹果供应商 Skyworks Solutions 周二预测第四季度营收和利润将高于华尔街预期，得益于经济不确定性背景下对其模拟芯片的稳定需求，该公司股价在盘后交易中上涨约 10%。【原文：Apple supplier Skyworks Solutions forecast fourth-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, benefiting from steady demand for its analog chips amid economic uncertainty, sending its shares up around 10% in extended trading.】

item.title: 交易日：滞胀-ISM
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 巴西与日本牛肉谈判聚焦巴西小州，令业界不安
item.description: 据多个消息来源称，目前正在进行的向巴西牛肉开放日本市场的谈判主要集中在巴西三个出口小州的供应上，这让渴望获得高薪客户的南美国家牛肉业的其他部分感到不安。【原文：Ongoing talks to open the Japanese market to Brazilian beef are focusing on supplies from three small Brazilian exporting states, upsetting other parts of the South American country's industry that are eager to reach the high-paying customers, according to multiple sources.】

item.title: 由于网络设备需求强劲，Arista 预测第三季度营收乐观
item.description: 阿里斯塔网络公司（Arista Networks）周二预计，第三季度收入将高于华尔街预期，这表明在数据中心规模不断扩大的情况下，市场对其网络设备的需求将保持稳定。【原文：Arista Networks on Tuesday forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street expectations, signaling resilient demand for its networking equipment amid growing footprint of data centers.】

item.title: 新闻集团数字订阅增长，营收超出预期
item.description: 受道琼斯数字订阅稳步增长的推动，媒体集团新闻集团周二公布的第四季度营收超出华尔街预期。【原文：Media conglomerate News Corp topped Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday, driven by steady growth in digital subscriptions from its Dow Jones segment.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 AMD 预计第三季度营收高于预期
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）周二预计第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期，该公司押注于企业对其人工智能芯片的乐观需求，这些企业急于扩大基础设施以主导最新技术。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, betting on upbeat demand for its artificial intelligence chips from businesses rushing to expand infrastructure to dominate the latest technology.】

item.title: 广告竞争激烈，Snap创下一年多来收入增长最慢纪录
item.description: Snap 周二公布的第二季度财报显示，其收入增长速度为一年多来最慢，这表明来自 Meta 等大型社交媒体竞争对手的竞争日益激烈。【原文：Snap on Tuesday reported second-quarter revenue growth that was the slowest in more than a year, a sign of growing competition from bigger social media rivals including Meta.】

item.title: Match Group 营收高于预期，希望通过人工智能推动吸引 Z 世代
item.description: 周二，受 Hinge 业绩强劲以及新任首席执行官斯宾塞-拉斯科夫（Spencer Rascoff）重新调整战略重点的影响，Tinder 母公司 Match Group 第二季度营收超出华尔街预期。【原文：Tinder-parent Match Group's second-quarter revenue surpassed Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, buoyed by strong performance at Hinge and a renewed strategic focus under new CEO Spencer Rascoff.】

item.title: 超微公司季度营收不及预期
item.description: 本周二，超微公司第四季度营收未达华尔街预期，受用于训练人工智能模型的高性能计算机的大型服务器制造商的激烈竞争影响。【原文：Super Micro missed Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter revenue on Tuesday, hit by intense competition from larger server makers for high-performance computers used to train artificial-intelligence models.】

item.title: 全球贸易紧张局势引发 Lucid 下调年度产量预期
item.description: 本周二，Lucid 下调了年产量预期，季度营收未达华尔街预期，而此时正值美国贸易紧张局势给一些汽车制造商蒙上了一层阴影，因为消费者正在控制大额消费预算。【原文：Lucid lowered its annual production forecast and missed Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Tuesday, at a time when U.S. trade tensions have cast a dark cloud over some automakers as consumers rein in big spending budgets.】

item.title: 由于成本增加、信贷收入减少，Rivian 公司亏损超出预期
item.description: 周二，Rivian Automotive 公布的季度亏损高于预期，原因是用于制造电动汽车零部件的稀土金属供应中断导致成本上升，而出售给传统汽车制造商的信用额度收入减少。【原文：Rivian Automotive reported a higher-than-expected quarterly loss on Tuesday as disruption in supply of rare earth metals used to make parts of its electric vehicles raised costs and income from credits sold to traditional automakers dwindled.】

item.title: 安进公司季度业绩超出华尔街预期
item.description: 安进公司周二公布的季度财务业绩超出华尔街预期，原因是产品销售额增长 9% 抵消了运营费用的增加。【原文：Amgen on Tuesday posted quarterly financial results that beat Wall Street expectations as a 9% increase in product sales offset higher operating expenses.】

item.title: 两名中国公民在加州被控非法向中国运送英伟达人工智能芯片
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，两名中国公民在加利福尼亚州被捕，并被指控非法向中国运输价值数千万美元的人工智能芯片，其中包括英伟达 H100 芯片。【原文：Two Chinese nationals were arrested in California and charged with illegally shipping tens of millions of dollars' worth of AI chips to China, including Nvidia H100s, the U.S. Justice Department said Tuesday.】

item.title: 必和必拓和隆丁将申请阿根廷激励措施，但其他矿商担心错过机会
item.description: 必和必拓（BHP）和伦丁集团（Lundin）的高管们在本周举行的一次矿业会议上表示，必和必拓和伦丁计划很快为其维库纳铜矿项目申请阿根廷新的投资激励计划，但其他矿商担心，在该计划一年后的截止日期之前，他们可能会被排除在外。【原文：BHP and Lundin plan to soon apply for a new Argentine investment incentives scheme for their Vicuna copper project, but other miners fear they may get left out before the program's cut-off date a year from now, executives said at a mining conference this week.】

item.title: 加拿大将向木材行业提供高达 12 亿加元的援助以应对美国关税
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周二表示，加拿大将提供高达12亿加元（8.7亿美元）的资金，帮助软木木材生产商应对美国的反补贴和反倾销税。【原文：Canada will provide up to C$1.2 billion ($870 million) to help softwood lumber producers deal with U.S. countervailing and anti-dumping duties, Prime Minister Mark Carney said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 卡尼表示，加拿大将帮助木材行业应对美国关税
item.description: 路透社渥太华8月5日电）加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周二表示，加拿大将提供高达12亿加元的资金，帮助软木木材生产商应对美国的反补贴和反倾销税。【原文：OTTAWA, Aug 5 (Reuters) - Canada will provide up to C$1.2 billion to help softwood lumber producers deal with U.S. countervailing and anti-dumping duties, Prime Minister Mark Carney said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国石油公司在巴西发现大量油气资源，为 Equinor 公司的拍卖前景增添砝码
item.description: 英国石油公司周一宣布在巴西近海桑托斯盆地发现了 25 年来全球最大的石油和天然气，这预示着 Equinor 在附近的利益以及对 10 月份该地区石油区块拍卖的强烈兴趣。【原文：BP's announcement on Monday of its largest global oil and gas discovery in 25 years in Brazil's offshore Santos basin bodes well for Equinor's nearby interests and strong appetite for an October auction of oil blocks in the region.】

item.title: Orange 将使用 OpenAI 的最新模型处理非洲语言
item.description: 法国移动运营商 Orange 周二表示，它计划将 OpenAI 的最新人工智能模型用于非洲语言。【原文：French mobile operator Orange said on Tuesday it plans to use OpenAI's latest AI models with African languages.】

item.title: OpenAI 发布专为在笔记本电脑上运行而优化的开放式推理模型
item.description: OpenAI 周二表示，它已发布了两个开放重量级语言模型，这两个模型在高级推理方面表现出色，并经过优化，可在笔记本电脑上运行，其性能水平与其较小的专有推理模型类似。【原文：OpenAI said on Tuesday it has released two open-weight language models that excel in advanced reasoning and are optimized to run on laptops with performance levels similar to its smaller proprietary reasoning models.】

item.title: 在线零售商 Zalando 在收购 About You 之后上调了 2025 年指导价格
item.description: 德国在线时尚市场 Zalando 周二上调了 2025 年业绩预期，将新收购的 About You 纳入其中。【原文：German online fashion marketplace Zalando raised its 2025 guidance on Tuesday after adjusting its projections to include newly acquired About You .】

item.title: 美国批评使用人工智能个性化机票价格，将展开调查
item.description: 美国交通部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）周二表示，交通部对使用人工智能制定个性化机票价格表示担忧，如果有人这样做，交通部将进行调查。【原文：U.S. Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy said Tuesday the department has concerns about the use of AI to set personalized airline ticket prices and will investigate if anyone does so.】

item.title: 美国高等级企业以更多股权和现金、更少债务为新并购融资
item.description: 银行家和投资者表示，今年以来，评级最高的美国公司主要通过股权和现金而不是债务为其收购融资，即使并购活动和降息希望升温，这些公司也可能继续这样做。【原文：Top-rated U.S. companies have financed their acquisitions mostly with equity and cash instead of debt this year, and could continue doing so even as M&A activity and hopes of interest rate cuts rise, bankers and investors said.】

item.title: 从原料成本到需求下滑，关税进一步抑制企业盈利
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发动的关税战给各企业带来了更多的痛苦，卡特彼勒（Caterpillar）、万豪（Marriott）等行业领军企业周二指出，需求疲软，价格上涨。【原文：Companies across the corporate spectrum revealed more pain from the cost of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff war, with bellwethers Caterpillar, Marriott and others on Tuesday noting weaker demand and higher prices.】

item.title: Shein和Temu在南非时装市场上超越全球零售巨头
item.description: 周二的一份报告显示，中国创办的电子商务零售商Shein和Temu已占据南非零售、服装、纺织品、鞋类和皮革（CTFL）市场3.6%的份额，2024年的销售额将达到73亿兰特（约合4.05亿美元）。【原文：China-founded e-commerce retailers Shein and Temu have captured a combined 3.6% share of South Africa's retail, clothing, textile, footwear and leather (CTFL) market, accounting for 7.3 billion rand ($405 million) in sales in 2024, a report showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥公布解决墨西哥石油公司（Pemex）债务问题、促进投资的计划
item.description: 墨西哥政府周二宣布了一项计划，旨在使负债累累的国营石油公司墨西哥石油公司（Pemex）实现财政自给自足，并建立一个新的投资工具，努力稳定石油生产。【原文：Mexico's government on Tuesday announced a plan aimed at moving its highly indebted state oil company Pemex toward financial self-sufficiency, and the establishment of a new investment vehicle and efforts to stabilize oil production.】

item.title: 参议员要求美国调查 DeepSeek 的数据安全问题
item.description: 由七位美国共和党参议员组成的小组周二要求商务部评估 DeepSeek 等中国开源人工智能模型带来的潜在数据安全漏洞。【原文：A group of seven Republican U.S. senators on Tuesday asked the Commerce Department to evaluate potential data security vulnerabilities posed by Chinese open-source AI models like DeepSeek.】

item.title: 美国提出新的无人机规则，可能导致星巴克和亚马逊送货上门
item.description: 美国交通部正在提议制定新的规则，以加快无人机在操作员视线范围之外的部署速度，这是推进包裹递送等商业用途所需的关键变革。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Department is proposing new rules to speed deployment of drones beyond the visual line of sight of operators, a key change needed to advance commercial uses like package deliveries.】

item.title: 巴西 BRF 股东批准与 Marfrig 合并
item.description: 据一份证券文件显示，巴西家禽和猪肉加工商 BRF 的股东周三投票通过了与牛肉加工商 Marfrig 合并的提议。【原文：Shareholders in Brazilian poultry and pork processor BRF voted on Wednesday to approve a proposed merger with beefpacker Marfrig , according to a securities filing.】
